description: The family will love this flavour-packed meal. Pre-marinated lamb kebabs saves you time in the kitchen and makes getting this meal on the table simple.
keywords: Lamb wrap,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Quick & easy lunch,Dinner Made Easy,Peanut free
name: Bbq Lamb, Mint & Honey Pita Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly grease barbecue plate with olive oil, then heat on low. Add kebabs and cook 4 minutes each side, 16 minutes total.
Meanwhile, in a large bowl, prepare Greek salad kit according to packet instructions.
Place pita bread on barbecue and heat for 20 seconds each side. Remove and cut in half.
Fill pita halves with salad and place a kebab, skewer removed, on each. Serve topped with dollops of yoghurt.
